name: Cube Man (itch)
description:
Quick project for an assignment in school over 2-3 weeks.

The Idea was to make an rpg game with some fun mechanics and learn what can be done in unity.

Mostly made by myself apart from a few textures and icons that was available from the assetstore. Music in the 2D part of the game is made by https://open.spotify.com/artist/2xbsXsSuFdwF85n2mSNVeF "Smash Killah"
